name: keep your marbles
description:
Keep Your Marbles is a hypercasual monochrome physics puzzle game where the player has extremely little direct control over whether or not they are able to “delay the inevitable” outcome of their marbles bouncing out of play.

Extremely small “game” I just wanted to enter something! Happy LD50!

Made with no image editor available, drawing polygons to the screen in Stencyl. Sound effects made in bfxr.
